text: Table 3. Selection of recommended drug combinations for prophylaxis in adults according to the guidelines by Gan etal [1] Dexamethasone 5-HT3-antagonist e Ondansetron® o Palonosetron e Ramosetron e Granisetron e Tropisefron® Aprepitant 5-HT3-antagonist o Ondansefron e Granisetron e Palonosetron Aprepitant Dexamethasone Droperidol 5-HT3-antagonist e Ondansetfron® e Granisetron o Palonosefron
